sentences.sContent: Many also attend the masquerade ball.
sentences.sCn: 许多人也会参加化装舞会。

sentences.sContent: One who wears a mask , especially a participant in a masquerade masque .
sentences.sContent_eng: One who wears a mask , especially a participant in a masquerade masque .
sentences.sCn: 他们第一次见面是在一个化装舞会上，两人都穿著很滑稽的服饰。

words.tran: 蒙面者；化装舞蹈者；戴假面具的人
冒充者；戴假面具者；参加假面舞会的人
戴面具；掩饰；化装（mask的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to pretend to be something or someone different
a formal dance or party where people wear  mask s  and unusual clothes
